item.title: Xmas cracker fix
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

today iv had a duper on my server duping phats he was lvl 3 so i decided making it so you must have say 4 combat to crack a cracker or somthing

iv tried

[code] if (itemUseID == 962) {
(combat >= 4 && combat <= 138) {
int prize = Item.randomPartyHat();
int get = getprizes();

            sendMessage("You crack the cracker...");
            deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1);
            p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you.");
            if (get == 1) {
                sendMessage("You get the prize!");
                addItem(Item2.randomcracker(), 1);
                p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize.");
            } else {
                sendMessage("They get the prize.");
                p2.addItem(Item2.randomcracker(), 1);
                p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!");
            }

} else {
[/code]

but its not working

Read full topic
